short_summary: Requests for preventative and corrective maintenance work on the medium voltage network at CFB Bagotville, Quebec. Estimated duration is 3 years and can be extended for 2 additional years.
description: The contract involves providing preventative and corrective maintenance for the medium voltage network, including inspections, repairs, and scheduled maintenance in accordance with the specifications provided.

full_summary:
Tender Announcement for Preventive and Corrective Maintenance Medium-Voltage Network
==============================================

**Tender Reference:** MX-42960379000
**Solicitation Number:** BA220018_81415
**Publication Date:** 2023-11-30
**Closing Date:** 2024-02-05T14:00:00
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Contracting Entity:** Construction de Défense Canada - Région du Québec
**Address:** 2030 boulevard Pie-IX, Bureau 224
**City:** Montreal
**Province:** Quebec
**Postal Code:** H1V 2C8
**Country:** Canada

**End User:** Not applicable
**Trade Agreements:** CETA, WTO-GPA, CFTA
**Regions of Opportunity:** Not specified
**Contract Period:** 3 years with possibility of 2 additional 1-year extensions

**Notice:**
This solicitation is for the provision of preventive and corrective maintenance services for a medium-voltage network (25 kV). The services include maintenance planning, inspection and repair, and emergency maintenance. The scope of work also includes specialized services such as transformer oil analysis and testing.

**Security Requirements:**
The contract will be awarded to a contractor that holds a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by Public Services and Procurement Canada (CSP). The security requirements are outlined in the Tender Documents.

**Bidding and Contact Information:**
Bidders can submit their offers and access the tender documentation on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; see [www.merx.com/public/pricing](http://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

**Point of Contact:**
Martin Desgagne
Email: [martin.desgagne@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:martin.desgagne@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
Phone: 418-718-1334

Please note that questions regarding this solicitation should only be directed to the point of contact identified above.

**Documents and Attachments:**
The bidding and documentation are available on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Please see the notice URL for the solicitation for details. There is no attachment to this entry.
